snippet.title: El Hijo - Official Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
#HandyGames is proud to present #ElHijo - a non-violent stealth #indie game. Guide him in this exciting spaghetti-western tale, on his quest to find his mother!

This crafty 6-year-old must sneak past the dangers of his world! As he overcomes his challenges, he gains self-confidence and cunning and with it more schemes to get past his foes.

Developed by the award-winning Honig Studios and published by HandyGames.

#stealth #indie #spaghetti #western 

STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/widget/853050/

GOG.com:
https://www.gog.com/game/el_hijo_a_wild_west_tale

www.handy-games.com. ▶
